name: Maria the Heartless
description:
"To Ivan’s surprise, Maria placed his hand on her chest, where he felt there was no heartbeat."

Maria the Heartless is an interactive short story based on Russian fairy tales. 

Originally written as an extra credit assignment for RUT3514: Russian Fairy Tales.

Completed during Finally Finish Something 2023.

If you enjoyed playing and want to see more interactive fiction, please support me through Ko-Fi.

Credit:

  • Writing, Programming: Eileen Calub
  • Twine template: Vahnya
  • Art and cover image made with Canva assets
  • Song: Sini Platocheck from Balalaika by Sania Poustylnikoff
